description.raw:
* Fix incorrect path for icon in winshell config. This fixes the "BLACS has no icon when launched with `python -m blacs`" bug.

* Remove `--delay` from restarting. It is no longer needed as the server is now
    cleanly shut down and does not rely on the process ending for the port
    to be freed. Removing  `--delay` makes the restart arguments identical to
    the arguments that initially started the program, which makes Windows recognise
    BLACS as BLACS, rather than displaying the wrong icon in the taskbar.  Windows is silly, since we most certainly tell it that BLACS is BLACS, but it won't believe us if the command line arguments aren't right.
description.html:
• Fix incorrect path for icon in winshell config. This fixes the "BLACS has no icon when launched with python -m blacs" bug.

  • Remove --delay from restarting. It is no longer needed as the server is now cleanly shut down and does not rely on the process ending for the port to be freed. Removing --delay makes the restart arguments identical to the arguments that initially started the program, which makes Windows recognise BLACS as BLACS, rather than displaying the wrong icon in the taskbar. Windows is silly, since we most certainly tell it that BLACS is BLACS, but it won't believe us if the command line arguments aren't right.

title: Winshell bugfixes

summary.raw:
* Fix incorrect path for icon in winshell config. This fixes the "BLACS has no icon when launched with `python -m blacs`" bug.

* Remove `--delay` from restarting. It is no longer needed as the server is now
    cleanly shut down and does not rely on the process ending for the port
    to be freed. Removing  `--delay` makes the restart arguments identical to
    the arguments that initially started the program, which makes Windows recognise
    BLACS as BLACS, rather than displaying the wrong icon in the taskbar.  Windows is silly, since we most certainly tell it that BLACS is BLACS, but it won't believe us if the command line arguments aren't right.
summary.html:
• Fix incorrect path for icon in winshell config. This fixes the "BLACS has no icon when launched with python -m blacs" bug.

  • Remove --delay from restarting. It is no longer needed as the server is now cleanly shut down and does not rely on the process ending for the port to be freed. Removing --delay makes the restart arguments identical to the arguments that initially started the program, which makes Windows recognise BLACS as BLACS, rather than displaying the wrong icon in the taskbar. Windows is silly, since we most certainly tell it that BLACS is BLACS, but it won't believe us if the command line arguments aren't right.
